page.title: 15W.CHILTINGTON EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: Most women work in W.Chilt.or at home only a few go to the nearby villages or towns. Many are both{housewives}and have another job. Some are{Home Helps. They help the needy look after their home and family. Many are{Secretaries. Others work in{Schools,Hospitals,Shops or{Nurseries.}A few are{Directors. Most men work out of the village up to{50 miles away.}There is a great variety of work amongst the men. Some own or work in{farms or nurseries; {flower growing}is a speciality. Others own firms or work in the{building trade or are{self employed fitters. There are many{Managers and Directors with several{Accountants, Designers, {Insurance Executives and Retired people. Some unusual occupations are {Fish Pathologist, Motorway Maintenance {Engineer,}(nearest motorway is at Crawley) and a {Chemical Manufacturer.
